sentences.en: A further refinement in semiconductor technology is the integrated circuit.
sentences.cn: 在半导体工艺中,集成电路是一次革新.

sentences.en: A refinement of the calculation is warranted.
All programs have bugs and need endless refinement.
sentences.cn: 所有的程序都有漏洞,都需要不断改进.

sentences.en: Gasoline is produced by the refinement of petroleum.
sentences.cn: 汽油是由石油经过提炼生产出来的.

sentences.en: He had retained the distinction and refinement of Chinese manner.
sentences.cn: 他保持了特殊的,文雅的中国礼节.

sentences.en: Her mother is a woman with great refinement.
sentences.cn: 她母亲是一个非常文雅的女人。

sentences.en: Nor is the charge of over - refinement altogether applicable to the Brahmins.
sentences.cn: 指责绅士派文人过于文雅,也并非完全得当.

sentences.en: Older cars inevitably lack the latest safety refinements.
sentences.cn: 较老式的汽车难免缺乏最新的安全改进。

sentences.en: Parts II and III provide useful principles for the Refinement phase.
sentences.cn: 另外,程序员在细化阶段也应该密切参与,这是很关键的.

sentences.en: Patronizing these actors was considered a sign of " refinement . "
sentences.cn: 据说这是 风雅 的事.

sentences.en: Religion like everything else had undergone great refinement.
sentences.cn: 像其他任何东西一样,宗教也经历了巨大的改进和完善.

sentences.en: Sally is a woman of great refinement and beauty.
sentences.cn: 莎莉是个温文尔雅又很漂亮的女士。

sentences.en: The model also serves to suggest further experimentation and refinement of concepts.
sentences.cn: 模型也有助于启发进一步的实验,以及对概念的加工提高.

sentences.en: There was the same refinement of brow and nostril in both.
sentences.cn: 两人的额头和鼻梁同样细嫩.

sentences.en: This particular model has a further refinement.
sentences.cn: 这一款式又有了进一步的改进。

sentences.en: To this pleasure camping gives an exquisite refinement.
sentences.cn: 露营给这种乐趣以尽善尽美的优雅意境.

sentences.en: Was it the last refinement of high culture?
sentences.cn: 或者这是一种修养高深的文雅表现?

words.tran_cn: [油气][化工][冶] 精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的

trans.tran_cn: 精炼，提纯，净化，改良品，细微的改良，极致，优雅，高贵的动作
